title: Chocolate MakingExperience for £16 at Sallan’s Chocolates (£40Value)
highlights:
• Make up to 60 gift wrapped chocolates to take home
  • Led by chocolatier Allan Davison-Collier
  • Non-dairy cream used
  • Suitable for vegans
  • Classes last up to 3 hours

title: Introduction to Rock Climbing With Assessment and Climbing Day Pass for £10 at Bournemouth University(£25.50 Value)
highlights:
• 2 hour induction to climbing, 10 minute climbing assessment, and a climbing day pass
  • Central location at Talbot Campus, Bournemouth University
  • Equipment included
  • Finger/campus board and bouldering wall available
